attributes.action: Abolish the vat from sanitary products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The average woman would have about 500 periods in their lifetime, yet we still have to pay VAT on sanitary products such as tampons and towels. The govt did reduce the VAT in 2001 from 17.5% to 5%, but they need to be VAT free. It is not like they are luxuries.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/sanprotax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
